alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southwestern Decatur and southeastern Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 815 PM EDT/715 PM CDT/... At 725 PM EDT/625 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Chattahoochee to 17 miles west of Blountstown. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Rosedale, Recovery, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Kennys Mill and Jinks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
